isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 2000, 4000, 8000 - HEATER AND AIR CONDITIONER - DESCRIPTION

svcsubsecinfo.para: Use with Circuit Diagram Book CTS-5122W.

svcproc.title: Cab Air Conditioning and Heater System
svcproc.para: The heater only system has a blower motor circuit. The heater/air conditioning system has a blower motor circuit and a compressor control circuit. The compressor control circuit is tied to the blower motor circuit. With each system, the blower motor can be set to off, low, medium or high speed to circulate warm or cool air throughout the cab.
